thread.title: FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days

title: FIFA suspends Sepp Blatter and Michel Platini for 90 days
text:
Published By: Baltimore Sun News - Today 
FIFA has provisionally banned President Sepp Blatter and UEFA President Michel Platini for 90 days in the wake of a Swiss criminal invest...
